title: More worrying tech supply chain news - no, it's not more RAM troubles, but this vital material could be set to cause issues sooner than expected
full_text:
More worrying tech supply chain news - no, it's not more RAM troubles, but this vital material could be set to cause issues sooner than expected. Copper demand is rising fast due to electrification, data centers, and renewable energy, while supply struggles and recycling cannot meet needs..
  • Global copper demand will outpace supply by millions of metric tons soon, experts warn
  • Recycling alone cannot meet growing copper demand over the next two decades
  • China domina… [+3943 chars]
